definition: the handle of a handgun, the butt end of a rifle, shotgun, or part of the support of a machine gun or artillery gun
details:
noun
- the handle of a handgun, the butt end of a rifle, shotgun, or part of the support of a machine gun or artillery gun
= example: the handle of a handgun, the butt end of a rifle, shotgun, or part of the support of a machine gun or artillery gun
= synonyms: stock
